channel.title: IHPC on NeiNeiHippo
channel.description: Recent content in IHPC on NeiNeiHippo

item.title: Parallel List Ranking - Helman & JaJa
item.description: Recently I implemented a list ranking algorithm “Designing Practical Efficient Algorithms for Symmetric Multiprocessors” by Helman & JaJa, in my OMSCS course Intro to High Performance Computing. You can download the paper here. There’s also a very helpful introduction by a fellow classmate, which makes it much easier to understand the concepts. But if you want to implement the algorithm, don’t skip the paper, as a matter of fact, implement it faithfully or you code may end up in a very bad place.
